Events & Celebrations
Home
/
Gather
/ Events & Celebrations
A Destination for Your Celebrations
Whether you’re planning a family reunion, celebrating a milestone birthday, commemorating a graduation, or hosting a baby shower or bachelor and bachelorette party, Sunland RV Resorts offer a variety of venues to accommodate groups of all sizes. Nestled in stunning settings, with luxury amenities, and a variety of activities, our resorts provide the perfect setting to socialize, celebrate, and reconnect.
celebrate your next event
At One Of Our Properties
Golden Village Palms RV Resort
Hemet, California
View Resort
Emerald Desert RV Resort
Palm Desert, California
View Resort
parties and celebrations
There’s always a reason to celebrate and our resorts are designed with everything you need to ignite your celebrations and sustain your enjoyment.
start planning
quinceanera
Our resorts boast nature’s breathtaking scenery because a coming-of-age celebration deserves a backdrop as beautiful as she is.
start planning
indoor and outdoor event venues
Our select resorts over a variety of event venues, adaptable to your specific needs. These venues include:
Clubhouses
Outdoor spaces and gardens
Pool areas
Catering vendor partners
Tables and chairs
Event coordinators
start planning
Destinations That Inspire Good Times
Situated in prime California and Florida locations, our resorts put you in the heart of sightseeing explorations, total relaxation, and outdoor adventure.
start planning
family reunions
Our resorts are the perfect place to reunite and reconnect with your relatives.
start planning

Don’t Miss Out
Exclusive News & Offers
Get ready for an unforgettable family vacation, weekend escape, or thrilling adventure at San Diego RV Resort. Our resort offers exclusive specials and seasonal deals that will make your stay affordable and extraordinary. With spacious RV sites, amenities, and activities, we’ve got everything you need for a fantastic time!

Contact Corporate
Home
/ Contact Corporate
Have A Question Or Comment For Our Corporate Team?
P.O. Box 9025 La Jolla, CA 92038
Call Corporate Office
Email Corporate
Do you have a comment or question regarding one of our resorts? Please use our form below and let us know how we can improve our service. All messages are sent directly to our corporate office. If you need to contact the resort directly, then please visit their website and use the contact form located there. We look forward to hearing from you.

Contact Us
Home
/ Contact Us
Connect with Us for an Unforgettable RV Resort Experience
Looking to make your vacation truly unforgettable? Don’t hesitate to contact our Silver Palms RV Resort team! We’re here to offer assistance, answer your questions, and provide information to ensure your stay is amazing. Whether you need recommendations on local attractions or have inquiries about our amenities, our friendly staff is ready to help. Contact us today and let us help you create lasting memories at Silver Palms RV Resort.
